ygData.subject: RE: Psalm Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: The Psalm of Warmth is the only one I know of that stack with others class dmg shield.  When you play the psalm of cooling, the other dmg shield will take
ygData.messageBody:
The Psalm of Warmth is the only one I know of that stack with others' class
dmg shield. When you play the psalm of cooling, the other dmg shield will
take precedence. Also I thought that the Warmth and the cooling does not
stack among themselve for when I tried it out like a month ago I would have
warmth only until I stop warmth will I then get cooling song to effect.

Syren Wynd

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 6:05 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Psalm Questions


From: <kim@...>

On Fri, 22 Oct 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> Heh, everytime I have used Psalm I have been in a group with higher level
> characters (who are dealing out more damage). Guess that explains why I
> never got the message. Man do I feel stupid:-)

Heh. Don't feel too bad. For the longest time I was telling
everyone it didn't stack with other damage shields, because
when I sang Warmth and a druid/ranger was hit, I'd only see
the "pierced by thorns" message. Then one of them slapped a
damage shield on me and the light dawned - I saw I was only
getting one message, but the damage was for both shields
combined. Doh. :-)
--
John H. Kim
kim@...

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
